text: Ara yadi apani bismita hana, tabe bismayera bisaya tadera katha [1]: â€˜Matite parinata ha'oyara para'o ki amara nutana jibana labha karaba [2]?â€™ Era'i tara, yara tadera rabera sathe kuphari kareche [3] ara era'i tara, yadera galaya thakabe sikala [4]. Ara tara'i agunera adhibasi, sekhane tara sthayi habe
